channel.title: [z508] need help to make edge bank outside pvp non multi!
channel.description: Hey, i have a problem with my z508 when ever i got ::pvp it go inside of edge bank but when you go outside of the bank its not 1v1 its multi, can anyone help me? make it non multi and just 1v1 outside of edge bank? thanks
